Pre-Game Insights: The Orioles lead 1-0 in a three-game series against the Colorado Rockies.
Saturday's game is the second time these teams square off this season.
Baltimore has the top team slugging percentage in the majors at.442.
Colorado has a 50-86 record overall and a 31-36 record in home games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The line for the game is Orioles -173, Rockies +144; over/under is 11 1/2 runs.
Brenton Doyle has 23 doubles, four triples, 22 home runs and 66 RBI for the Rockies.
Gunnar Henderson has 24 doubles, six triples and 33 home runs for the Orioles.
Brendan Rodgers is 11-for-41 with a double, three home runs and five RBI over the past 10 games.
Colton Cowser is 10-for-37 with three doubles, a triple and two home runs over the past 10 games.
Others: Lucas Gilbreath is on the 15-Day IL with a shoulder injury.
German Marquez is on the 60-Day IL with an elbow injury.
Ryan Mountcastle is on the 10-Day IL with a wrist injury.
Zach Eflin is on the 15-Day IL with a shoulder injury.
